name: Don Jose - Maduro - Granada
additionalNotes: Grown in the volcanic rich soils of Nicaragua, Don Jose cigars are hand-made using the same techniques used by rollers in conquistador times. This Cuban-seed, 100% long filler classic smoke features a medium to full-bodied taste boasting notes of cream and coffee throughout. With an all-Nicaraguan filler and binder combination and a rich and dark Brazilian Maduro wrapper.
